HomePage.title: Hello World!
HomePage.review1: It is an incredible platform that provides an engaging and accessible experience for children with motor and cognitive disabilities. Designed with inclusivity in mind, it features intuitive controls, adaptive difficulty levels, and interactive gameplay that keeps kids entertained while supporting their development.

Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.placeholder: Your insights guide us in making Samga even better.

GuidelinesPage.title: Guidelines
GuidelinesPage.lead-paragraph:
Games are way more enjoyable without any glitches. To make sure your
 experience is smooth and glitch-free while learning through play, follow the
 guidelines.
GuidelinesPage.rule1:
What you
 need to
 start the
 game
GuidelinesPage.rule1-paragraph:
To dive into the
 game, all you
 need is a solid
 internet
 connection, a
 laptop, and a
 webcam.
GuidelinesPage.rule2-paragraph:
Make sure you 
 are at least 4 feet
 from the
 webcam and that
 you have sample
 space to move.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph:
When playing on a
 laptop, make sure you
  have enough battery
 power.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-parapgraph2:
Avoid bright lights in
 in the users' background.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph3:
Avoid bad lighting or
 less light in the users'
 background
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph4:
Avoid backgrounds
 with a lot of
 artwork of colours.
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph5:
Play in front of a
 plain background so
 the camera detects
 you properly
GuidelinesPage.rule3-paragraph6:
Avoid wearing clothing
 that cover your hands
 like shawls, open
 jackets.
GuidelinesPage.answer1: You can play on laptops and PCs with a webcam.
GuidelinesPage.answer2: A stable broadband connection is recommended.
GuidelinesPage.question3: Can I use an external webcam?
GuidelinesPage.answer3: Yes, as long as it provides a clear image.
GuidelinesPage.question4: Why is my movement not being detected?
GuidelinesPage.answer4: Ensure good lighting and a clear background.

Dashboard.title: Let's start playing
Dashboard.title-p: Make sure to follow all these steps
Dashboard.step1-text: Connect your webcam and check your internet.
Dashboard.step2-text: Use a computer screen and stand 3-4 feet away.
